channel.title: Help with making member
channel.description:
i need help with making players a member... i know how too make mod and stuff like player rights = 3 , 2 , 1 but i just cant figure out Member..
please answer me back quick thx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2008, 04:57:45 pm[/size][hr]please anyone? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2008, 04:59:22 pm[/size][hr]can anyone please quick?

item.title: Help with making member
item.dc:creator: @Merble Merble
item.description:
@Merble wrote:

go to the characters folder, look for the person, open the file look for
character-ismember = 1 (with membership)
character-ismember = 0 (without membership)

By default everyone should have membership

Read full topic
